Method Detail

isAutorun

public boolean isAutorun()
Description copied from interface: RmiExporter
Checks if is autorun.

Specified by:
isAutorun in interface RmiExporter
Returns:
boolean.

setAutorun

public void setAutorun(boolean autorun)
Description copied from interface: RmiExporter
Thiết lập chế độ autorun cho rmi service exporter. Nếu chỉ định true, tự động ngay sau khi service bean được container khởi tạo, rmi service cũng sẽ được export. Ngược lại nếu chỉ định là false, chỉ khi nào rmi service được chỉ định run service (thông qua runService method) thì exporter mới được khởi động.

Specified by:
setAutorun in interface RmiExporter
Parameters:
autorun - giá trị boolean cần thiết lập.

public void setServicePort(int servicePort)
Description copied from interface: RmiExporter
Sets the service port of the exported RMI service will use.

Default is 0 (anonymous port).

setReplaceExistingBinding

public void setReplaceExistingBinding(boolean replaceExistingBinding)
Description copied from interface: RmiExporter
Set whether to replace an existing binding in the RMI registry, that is, whether to simply override an existing binding with the specified service in case of a naming conflict in the registry.

Specified by:
setReplaceExistingBinding in interface RmiExporter
Parameters:
replaceExistingBinding - the replace existing binding

activate

public void activate()
Description copied from interface: Initializing
Invoked by the container after it has set all bean properties supplied (and satisfied ProviderAware and DefinitionAware). This method allows the bean instance to perform initialization only possible when all bean properties have been set.
